Text: Greetings, komrade. How's it going? I see you have an account at Miniinova now. Awesome. That has helped me a lot with my uploads and with the inconsistency of TPB. I hope they can resolve their issues. I'm a huge fan and supporter of TPB. I hope that you are seeing more downloads. Thanks again for upload Glenn's podcasts. He's an amazing person and we all need him more than ever. I will continue downloading and seeding your uploads. Take care.
